full_text: Mary Pixie is a classic styled pixie bonnet with a and a simple lace body. I chose to use a cotton yarn so to make it a summer sun protection bonnet, but she would look beautiful in a merino as well. Materials – appx 65-150yds sport weight (size 3) yarn (I used Willow yarns Farmhouse Cotton), size 4 (3.5mm) straight AND dpn, 2 stitch markers, yarn needle Gauge -6sts/in Sizes – newborn, 0-3mth, (3-6mth, 6-12m), toddler, child Appx Finished Measurements – Newborn 5x5ins, infant 6x6ins, sitter/crawler 6.5x6.5ins, toddler 7x7ins, child 7.5x7.5ins (measurements are for bonnet when laid flat) Download this free pattern here
name: Ravelry: Mary Pixie pattern by Amanda Morse
